severities.name: none
severities.description: Do not show anything to the user when this style is not being followed, however code generation features will generate in this style.

severities.name: suggestion
severities.description: When this style is not being followed, show it to the user as a suggestion (underlying dots on the first two characters).

severities.name: warning
severities.description: When this style is not being followed, show a compiler warning (green squiggle).

severities.name: error
severities.description: When this style is not being followed, show a compiler error (red squiggle).

properties.name: root
properties.description: Special property that should be specified at the top of the file outside of any sections. Set to "true" to stop .editorconfig files search on current file.

properties.name: charset
properties.description: File character encoding

properties.name: end_of_line
properties.description: Line ending file format (Unix, DOS, Mac)

properties.name: indent_style
properties.description: Indentation style

properties.name: indent_size
properties.description: A whole number defining the number of columns used for each indentation level and the width of soft tabs (when supported). When set to tab, the value of tab_width (if specified) will be used.

properties.name: tab_width
properties.description: A whole number defining the number of columns used to represent a tab character. This defaults to the value of indent_size and doesn't usually need to be specified.

properties.name: trim_trailing_whitespace
properties.description: Denotes whether whitespace is allowed at the end of lines

properties.name: insert_final_newline
properties.description: Denotes whether file should end with a newline

properties.name: max_line_length
properties.description: Forces hard line wrapping after the amount of characters specified

properties.name: csharp_style_conditional_delegate_call
properties.description: Prefer to use conditional coalescing operation (?.) when invoking a lambda instead of performing a null check (e.g., 'func?.Invoke(args);').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_accessors
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for accessors (e.g., 'public int Age { get => _age; set => _age = value; }').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_constructors
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for constructors (e.g., 'public Customer(int age) => Age = age;').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_indexers
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for indexers (e.g., 'public T this[int i] => _value[i];').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_methods
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for methods (e.g., 'public int GetAge() => this.Age;').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_operators
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for operators.

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_properties
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for properties (e.g., 'public int Age => _age;').

properties.name: csharp_style_inlined_variable_declaration
properties.description: Prefer 'out' variables to be declared inline when possible (e.g., 'if (int.TryParse(value out int i) {...}').

properties.name: csharp_style_pattern_matching_over_as_with_null_check
properties.description: Prefer pattern matching instead of 'as' expressions with null-checks to determine if something is of a particular type (e.g., 'if (o is string s) {...}').

properties.name: csharp_style_pattern_matching_over_is_with_cast_check
properties.description: Prefer pattern matching instead of 'is' expressions with type casts (e.g., 'if (o is int i) {...}').

properties.name: csharp_style_throw_expression
properties.description: Prefer to use 'throw' expressions instead of 'throw' statements.

properties.name: csharp_style_var_elsewhere
properties.description: Prefer 'var' in all cases unless overridden by another code style rule.

properties.name: csharp_style_var_for_built_in_types
properties.description: Prefer 'var' is used for built-in system types such as 'int'.

properties.name: csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent
properties.description: Prefer 'var' when the type is already mentioned on the right-hand side of a declaration expression.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_catch
properties.description: Place catch on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_else
properties.description: Place else on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_finally
properties.description: Place finally on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_members_in_anonymous_types
properties.description: Place members in anonymous types on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_members_in_object_initializers
properties.description: Place members in object initializers on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_open_brace
properties.description: Place new line before open brace

properties.name: csharp_new_line_between_query_expression_clauses
properties.description: Place query expression clauses on new line.

properties.name: csharp_indent_case_contents
properties.description: Indent switch case contents.

properties.name: csharp_indent_labels
properties.description: Label Positioning.

properties.name: csharp_indent_switch_labels
properties.description: Indent switch Labels.

properties.name: csharp_preserve_single_line_blocks
properties.description: Leave Block on Single Line.

properties.name: csharp_preserve_single_line_statements
properties.description: Leave Statements and Member Declarations on the Same Line.

properties.name: csharp_space_after_cast
properties.description: Require a space between a cast and the value.

properties.name: csharp_space_after_keywords_in_control_flow_statements
properties.description: Space After Keywords in Control Flow Statements.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_call_parameter_list_parentheses
properties.description: Space Within Parentheses for Method Call Argument List.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_declaration_parameter_list_parentheses
properties.description: Space Between Method Declaration Argument-List Parentheses.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_parentheses
properties.description: Space Within Parentheses for Other Options.

properties.name: csharp_prefer_braces
properties.description: Prefer braces when possible

properties.name: csharp_prefer_simple_default_expression
properties.description: Prefer default over default(T)

properties.name: dotnet_sort_system_directives_first
properties.description: Prefer to place 'System' directives first when sorting usings.

properties.name: dotnet_style_coalesce_expression
properties.description: Prefer null coalescing expression to ternary operator checking (e.g. 'var v = x ?? y;').

properties.name: dotnet_style_collection_initializer
properties.description: Prefer collections to be initialized using collection initializers when possible (e.g., 'var list = new List<int>{ 1, 2, 3 };').

properties.name: dotnet_style_explicit_tuple_names
properties.description: Prefer tuple names to ItemX properties (e.g., '(string name, int age) customer = GetCustomer(); var name = customer.name;').

properties.name: dotnet_style_null_propagation
properties.description: Prefer to use null-conditional operator where possible (e.g., 'var v = o?.ToString();').

properties.name: dotnet_style_object_initializer
properties.description: Prefer objects to be initialized using object initializers when possible (e.g., 'var c = new Customer(){ Age = 21 };').

properties.name: dotnet_style_predefined_type_for_locals_parameters_members
properties.description: For locals, parameters and type members, prefer types that have a language keyword to represent them (int, double, string, etc.) to use that keyword instead of the type name (Int32, Int64, etc.).

properties.name: dotnet_style_predefined_type_for_member_access
properties.description: Prefer the keyword whenever a member-access expression is used on a type with a keyword representation (int, double, string, etc.).

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_event
properties.description: Prefer all non-static events referenced from within non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# and 'Me.' in Visual Basic.

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_field
properties.description: Prefer all non-static fields used in non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# or 'Me.' in Visual Basic.

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_method
properties.description: Prefer all non-static methods called from within non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# and 'Me.' in Visual Basic.

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_property
properties.description: Prefer the all non-static properties used in non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# or 'Me.' in Visual Basic.
